document_data.name: Spearmint
document_data.mainbody: '''Spearmint''' was a type of plant of the [[mint]] family that produced a [[herb]] of the same name.<ref>
document_data.Usage: Spearmint could be brewed into a [[tea]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, [[Teseryne Truesilver]] of the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] offered spearmint tea and shortbread to her guests.
